title: Apache Ignite Web Console Demo
message: In order to try Apache Ignite Console in Demo mode you need to download and start ignite-web-agent.
We prepared several predefined clusters, caches, domain models and IGFS file systems.
You could try SQL and Monitoring features that will be executing on three nodes demo cluster that will be started inside agent.
Also you could try import metadata from demo database which also started inside agent.
